name: Harry Potter
comment: I was very eager to get the Husqvarna Vitpilen 250 (well waited for the test ride which took a long time due to covid Ktm showroom adyar)

name: Mako Mack
comment: No 1 in world With best looking, mileage is okay. More colours should be added, the colour is beautiful.

name: Venku Goo
comment: I loved this bike the first time I saw it and to my luck I was looking to purchase a new motorcycle and I knew it had to be this or a duke 390.

name: Jeans
comment: I was very eager to get the Husqvarna Vitpilen 250 (well waited for the test ride which took a long time due to covid Ktm showroom adyar)!

name: Rudi Kuchta
comment: Ground clearance will be a problem sometimes with pillion. Good performance-i clocked 160 km/h.

name: Hero Alom
comment: 1. Bike is in the best in class. 2. Riding on highways are very good. 3. Service cost is same as duke 250.
